title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Bruce Arians Retirement Reaction, Brady/Bowles Potential with Mike Silver
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Bruce Arians Retirement Reaction, Brady/Bowles Potential with Mike Silver
description:
Colin reacts to Bruce Arians sudden retirement announcement, why he thinks Brady is behind it, and how Brady will work with new head coach Todd Bowles (3:00).

Then, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver joins Colin to give his thoughts on the shocking Arians announcement, including if Arians was forced out (12:00), how it played out differently than the power struggle between Pete Carroll and Russell Wilson in Seattle (21:00), the difference between Brady's relationship with Belichick and Arians (25:00), and which successful coach/QB duo could be a blueprint for Todd Bowles and Brady (31:00). They also discuss which team could go all in on Liberty QB Malik Willis (36:00), if there's any way for the Niners to unload an injured Jimmy G (39:00), and why the trend of treating NFL draft picks like NBA picks continues to catch on (41:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
